selection_reasoning: The top trials have converged on a single optimal configuration with bilateral symmetry. I am selecting the highest precision versions of this (12_5, 12_2) and a diverse symmetric attempt (12_1) to ensure we aren't missing other high-quality basins.

trial_selections.reasoning: Highest precision 1.0 solution using jitter-and-refine. It represents the optimal symmetric basin.
Explicitly enforces bilateral symmetry, confirming the optimal structure for N=11.
A bilateral symmetry approach that reached 0.87. While lower, it might be a different symmetric basin or just needs the slack-variable refinement used in the 1.0 trials.
The 3-fold symmetric precursor to the 1.0 solutions. Useful to keep as a reference for how the symmetry was broken/refined.
